data.title: Celebrity Deaths of 2024: Stars We Lost This Year
data.meta_description: Shannen Doherty, Jacoby Jones and more celebrities died in 2024
data.text:
Hollywood mourned many celebrities in 2024.

Speed Racer star Christian Oliver (born Christian Klepser) died at the age of 51 during a fatal plane crash on January 5. Oliver was traveling home from a Caribbean vacation with his two daughters ‚Äî Madita and Annik, whom he shared with wife Jessica Klepser ‚Äî on January 4. The aircraft had engine trouble and fell into the ocean. The plane‚Äôs pilot also died onboard in the accident.

In addition to being an actor, Oliver was also a realtor at Beverly Hills brokerage The Agency.

‚ÄúChristian, Madita and Annik, you will be missed. May you rest in peace,‚Äù The Agency founder Mauricio Umansky wrote in a social media tribute. ‚ÄúMy prayers are with you and your entire Agency family. You are a great friend, father, husband, actor and agent. You made us laugh, you care more than most. You are missed and loved.‚Äù

Four days later, news broke that The Cleaning Lady star Aden Canto had died at the age of 42.

‚ÄúAdan had a depth of spirit that few truly knew. Those who glimpsed it were changed forever,‚Äù Canto‚Äôs rep said in a statement, revealing the actor privately battled appendiceal cancer. ‚ÄúHe will be greatly missed by so many.‚Äù

Canto is survived by his wife, Stephanie Canto, and their two children: Roman and Eve.

Keep scrolling to remember the stars who died in 2024:

Credit: VALERIE MACON/AFP via Getty Images

Connie Chiume

The Black Panther star, who appeared as a tribal leader in the Marvel movie, died at age 72 on August 6.

Chiume‚Äôs family revealed that the actress had gone through ‚Äúa period of illness‚Äù prior to her death.

‚ÄúThe Chiume family would like to extend their heartfelt gratitude for all the messages of support and condolences during this difficult time, as they cope with the loss of their mother,‚Äù an Instagram statement read. "Her children would like to express their deep appreciation to the doctors and nursing staff who provided exceptional care during her stay.‚Äù

The message concluded: ‚ÄúDetails of the memorial and funeral services will be shared on Connie's social media platforms in due course, as the family takes time to make the necessary arrangements."

Credit: FREDERIC J. BROWN/AFP via Getty Images

Abdul 'Duke' Fakir

The last surviving member of the musical group the Four Tops died at age 88 on July 22. Fakir‚Äôs family confirmed in a statement that he suffered heart failure in Detroit and was surrounded by his wife, Piper, and loved ones.

‚ÄúOur hearts are heavy as we mourn the loss of a trailblazer, icon and music legend who, through his 70-year music career, touched the lives of so many as he continued to tour until the end of 2023, and officially retired this year,‚Äù the statement read. ‚ÄúAs the last living founding member of the iconic The Four Tops music group, we find solace in Duke‚Äôs legacy living on through his music for generations to come.‚Äù

Credit: Frank Trapper/Corbis

Esta TerBlanche

Us confirmed the All My Children star died at age 51. Her goddaughter Barbie Ashley told TMZ that the actress died on July 18.

‚ÄúEsta was such a kind, loving, giving, and caring person,‚Äù TerBlanche‚Äôs manager, Annie Spoliansky, said in a statement to Us. ‚ÄúShe cared so deeply for all people and animals. She had squirrels she fed and looked after daily, her two cats, and recent kittens that she cared for as her own children. Esta was never anything but generous and lovely to me, and I‚Äôm grateful to have known her for the time that I did, and devastated to learn of her passing.‚Äù

Credit: Justin Casterline/Getty Images

Khyree Jackson

Jackson, who was drafted by the Minnesota Vikings earlier this year, died on July 6 after a fatal car accident. He was 24.

‚ÄúI am absolutely crushed by this news. Khyree brought a contagious energy to our facility and our team,‚Äù Vikings head coach Kevin O‚ÄôConnell said in a statement. ‚ÄúHis confidence and engaging personality immediately drew his teammates to him. In our short time together, it was evident Khyree was going to develop into a tremendous professional football player, but what was more impressive was his desire to become the best person he could be for his family and those around him. I am at a loss for words.‚Äù

Credit: Courtesy of Pretty Pastel Please/Instagram

Pretty Pastel Please

The friends and family of the Australian YouTuber, whose real name was Alexandra, revealed via Instagram on July 5 that she had died one month prior at age 30. ‚ÄúHer passing was sudden, unexpected and devastating to all who knew her,‚Äù read the statement, which featured a pic of Alex and her pet bird, Archie.

‚ÄúThis is a shock to us all, and her family and friends have requested privacy as they navigate their grief. We would ask that you respect their wishes ‚Äî they appreciate all of your support but need time to heal in private,‚Äù the announcement continued. The exact date and cause of her death were not revealed at the time.

Credit: Earl Gibson

Martin Mull

Mull died at age 80 in June after suffering from a long-term illness, per TMZ. Mull was known for his roles in Roseanne, Sabrina the Teenage Witch, Clue and more.

He is survived by his daughter, Maggie Mull, as well as his wife, Wendy Haas.

‚ÄúI am heartbroken to share that my father passed away at home on June 27th, after a valiant fight against a long illness,‚Äù Maggie captioned a photo of the late actor via Instagram on June 28. ‚ÄúHe was known for excelling at every creative discipline imaginable and also for doing Red Roof Inn commercials. He would find that joke funny. He was never not funny. My dad will be deeply missed by his wife and daughter, by his friends and coworkers, by fellow artists and comedians and musicians, and‚Äîthe sign of a truly exceptional person‚Äîby many, many dogs. I loved him tremendously.‚Äù

Credit: Christopher Polk/Getty Images

Donald Sutherland

The Hunger Games actor died on June 20 at the age of 88.

‚ÄúWith a heavy heart, I tell you that my father, Donald Sutherland, has passed away,‚Äù Donald‚Äôs son Kiefer wrote via Instagram. ‚ÄúI personally think one of the most important actors in the history of film. Never daunted by a role, good, bad or ugly. He loved what he did and did what he loved, and one can never ask for more than that. A life well lived.‚Äù

Donald is survived by his wife, Francine Racette, and his five children. He shared twins Kiefer and Rachel with ex-wife Shirley Douglas, as well as sons Roeg, Rossif and Angus with Racette.

Credit: Karwai Tang/WireImage

Marian Robinson

Michelle Obama‚Äôs mother died at age 86, the former first lady confirmed on May 31.

Marian ‚Äúpassed peacefully‚Äù earlier that day, according to a joint statement from Michelle, her husband, Barack Obama, Michelle‚Äôs brother, Craig Robinson, his wife, Kelly Robinson, and Marian‚Äôs grandchildren, Avery, Leslie, Malia, Sasha, Austin and Aaron.

‚ÄúMarian Lois Shields Robinson ‚Äî our mother, mother-in-law, and grandmother ‚Äî had a way of summing up the truths about life in a word or two, maybe a quick phrase that made everyone around her stop and think,‚Äù the family wrote, in part. ‚ÄúHer wisdom came off as almost innate, as something she was born with, but in reality, it was hard-earned, fashioned by her deep understanding that the world‚Äôs roughest edges could always be sanded down with a little grace.‚Äù

Credit: David Cannon/Getty Images

Grayson Murray

The PGA Tour golfer died on May 25, days after withdrawing from the Charles Schwab Challenge for an undisclosed illness.

‚ÄúWe were devastated to learn ‚Äì and are heartbroken to share ‚Äì that PGA Tour player Grayson Murray passed away this morning. I am at a loss for words,‚Äù PGA commissioner Jay Monahan said in a statement. ‚ÄúThe PGA Tour is a family, and when you lose a member of your family, you are never the same. We mourn Grayson and pray for comfort for his loved ones.‚Äù

Monahan continued: ‚ÄúI reached out to Grayson‚Äôs parents to offer our deepest condolences, and during that conversation, they asked that we continue with tournament play. They were adamant that Grayson would want us to do so. As difficult as it will be, we want to respect their wishes.‚Äù

Credit: Courtesy of Dr. Kimberley Nix/Instagram

Kimberley Nix

The TikTok star, who had been documenting her three-year cancer battle via social media, died in May at the age of 31.

‚ÄúHello followers, if you‚Äôre seeing this message I have passed away peacefully,‚Äù Nix said in a posthumous video released on May 8. ‚ÄúFor those of you who don‚Äôt know me, my name is Kim, hi! It‚Äôs so nice to meet you and you‚Äôre welcome to check out all the cool sarcoma facts, information and my lived experience with death and dying with sarcoma cancer. You don‚Äôt have to go just because you‚Äôre new.‚Äù

She continued, ‚ÄúI love you all, thank you so much for this amazing opportunity. I‚Äôm in happy tears because you‚Äôve all made me find so much purpose in the end of my life.‚Äù

Credit: Cover Images

Brian McCardie

McCardie died at age 59 on April 28, according to his family. "It is with great sadness that we announce the passing of Brian James McCardie (59), beloved son, brother, uncle and dear friend to so many. Brian passed away suddenly at home on Sunday 28th April," read a statement shared via social media. "A wonderful and passionate actor on stage and screen, Brian loved his work and touched many lives, and is gone much too soon. We love him and will miss him greatly; please remember Brian in your thoughts. Funeral arrangements will be announced in the days ahead. As a family, we would ask for privacy at this time.‚ù§Ô∏èüôèüíö."

McCardie was known for his work in the 1995 film Rob Roy starring Liam Neeson and the 1997 movie Speed 2: Cruise Control. He appeared on episodes of Shameless and Outsider and was expected to star in the Outlander prequel, Blood of My Blood.

Credit: Vivien Killilea/Getty Images for Trippie Redd/10K Projects

Chris King

The rapper was shot and killed in Nashville on April 20.

According to authorities, King and a group of friends were hanging out when a trio of strangers attempted to rob them. Gunfire broke out, ultimately leading to King‚Äôs death. He was 32 years old.

Tributes began pouring in on social media from many of King‚Äôs friends and collaborators, including Justin Bieber.

‚ÄúLove you bro. This one hurts,‚Äù Bieber wrote via his Instagram Stories. ‚ÄúPlease keep his family in your prayers. See you in paradise brother.‚Äù

Credit: Courtesy of Eva Evans/Instagram

Eva Evans

The social media influencer, who created the Prime Video series Club Rat, died on April 20. She was 29.

Evans' sister, Lila Joy, announced her death via social media one day after her death. ‚ÄúYesterday my family received news that our sweet, fabulous, creative, caring, hilarious Eva, my beautiful sister, has died,‚Äù Joy wrote via Instagram. ‚ÄúAfter 24 hours, i still find myself in a constant cycle of denial and acceptance, so i know how unbelievable and hard to process this news will be.‚Äù

A cause of death was not announced.
